ValidationRule.description: Location is required when Delivery type is Face to Face.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program' , ISPICKVAL( Product_Request__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design' ), ISBLANK( Location__c ), ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c , 'Face to Face' ) || ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Type__c , 'Blended' ), Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c = true )
